Generation VIII.Sword: It digs up the ground with its trunk. It's also very strong, being able to carry loads of over five tons without any problem at all.
Generation VIII.Shield: If a job requires serious strength, this Pokémon will excel at it. Its copper body tarnishes in the rain, turning a vibrant green color.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Using the pointy tip of its trunk, it carves off chunks of hard rocks to eat. It is very docile and helps people with physical labor.
Generation IX.Violet: Cufant can lift loads weighing five tons. In the mornings, it heads into caves with its herd, in search of the ore on which these Pokémon feed.

Generation VIII.Sword: Bridge Field Dusty Bowl , Giant's Seat ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Bridge Field Dusty Bowl , Giant's Seat ( Max Raid Battle )

Generation IX.Scarlet: East Province: Area Three Tera Raid Battles ( 2★ )
Generation IX.Violet: East Province: Area Three Tera Raid Battles ( 2★ )
